title: Forecasting and Monitoring Economic Indicators
descriptions:
**Abstract:**

This Proof of Concept (PoC) grant proposal, titled "Forecasting and Monitoring Economic Indicators," seeks funding from the European Research Council (ERC) to advance the outcomes of the previous ERC-2007-StG grant, "Change-Point Tests." The primary objective is to develop a comprehensive software toolbox that significantly enhances the forecasting and monitoring of economic indicators. This project introduces a novel family of models that leverage high-frequency data and real-time forecast monitoring, complemented by predictive breakdown tests to ensure the reliability of predictions. Key improvements over existing software include real-time monitoring capabilities and advanced predictive breakdown tests, designed to provide deeper insights into economic trends and potential anomalies.

Targeted at governments, central banks, and firms, the software will be user-friendly, featuring three-dimensional graphical representations and direct accessibility to decision-makers. Initial collaborations with a forecasting agency and a central bank have been established to ensure the practical applicability and robustness of the tools developed. The ultimate goal is to improve economic forecasts and decision-making processes, contributing to more prudent economic policies, sustainable economic growth, and enhanced economic and social welfare.
